track_sabotage.title: Following the Trail
track_sabotage.description: Chief Engineer Maya guides you through the failure reports: 'The pattern is methodical - they hit redundant systems first, then primary lines. Whoever's doing this understands our network better than most of our own engineers. But they made one mistake - the sabotage devices left electromagnetic signatures. I can trace them back to their source.'

choices.text: 'Show me these signatures - let's track them down.'
'Who has the expertise to plan attacks like this?'
'This level of knowledge suggests inside help.'
'Let me coordinate with other crisis response teams first.'
